User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"人员培训计划"，添加页眉显示"人力资源部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "人员培训计划", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "人力资源部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"培训对象"、"培训内容"和"培训安排"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "培训对象", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "培训内容", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "培训安排", level=2);

User instruction: 在"培训安排"下插入一个5行4列的表格。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 5, 4);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "培训主题");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "培训时间");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "培训地点");set_cell_text(table, 0, 3, "培训讲师");
